summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 13.8°C), outside temperature (down 11.0°C), and inside temperature (down 1.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 10641 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15244 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), and cloud levels (up 460 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 51.2m lower than yesterday, 460.0m lower than past week, 456.8m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 356m to a maximum of 641m, averaging 427.4m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 887.4m and 884.2m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, dry and less humid conditions and some wind, breezy at times. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and overcast conditions will limit sunlight. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
